txt.en:
'Do you have time enough to aid the expedition again? I would like you to speak with a friend of mine, Águti. He has travelled deeper into Moria with the expedition, and I have yet to hear back from him.

'You can find Águti down in the old Water-works in a place we call the Rotting Cellar, south-west of here, past the Silvertine Lodes.

'I'm given to understand that it isn't considered the most comfortable post....'

'Well met, [placeholder]. So, Simbi sent you down here did he? He must not like you very much then....

'No! No! 'Twas but a jest! It's just a bit damp down here but you get used to it -- as long as you can keep the mould out of your beard.

'I've been studying the creatures of Moria since I arrived here -- as much as I can without being devoured by them, at any rate -- and have learned a few things. If you would be willing to aid me, I'm sure we can uncover their secrets!'
'Go see Águti in the Rotting Cellar.'
Simbi is interested to hear from one of his friends, Aguti, about the progress of the expedition in the Water-works.
Talk to Águti at the Rotting Cellar camp

Águti is at the Rotting Cellar camp in the Water-works, far south-west of the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nSimbi has asked you to speak with Águti regarding the progress of the expedition in the Water-works.
